title: FOIL Request: Supporting Data for Governor Hochul’s Recent COVID-19 Statements

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting any and all documents, studies, memos, and data that support the following assertions made by Governor Kathy Hochul:

	1.	That prior COVID-19 vaccinations are not effective against the current spike in COVID-19 cases due to new variants.
	2.	That the U.S. is seeing increased rates of hospitalizations among babies due to COVID-19.

Please include any scientific studies, internal memos, or expert consultations that were used as a basis for these statements. I am interested in documents from the last two years, up to the current date.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jackson Parker

title: Documents Concerning Complaints about Attorneys and Nonattorneys

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide all of the following:
1. All complaints, communications, letters, investigations, findings, closure letters, and any other document, concerning any complaint about attorney Thomas Myers, SBN 176008.
2. All complaints, communications, letters, investigations, findings, closure letters, and any other document, concerning any complaint about disbarred attorney  Joseph Alan Hendrix, SBN 131556.
3. All complaints, communications, letters, investigations, findings, closure letters, and any other document, concerning any complaint about Douglas Lawrence Mahaffey, SBN 125980.
4. All complaints, communications, letters, investigations, findings, closure letters, and any other document, concerning any complaint about Steven Quintanilla, SBN 161578.
5. All complaints, communications, letters, investigations, findings, closure letters, and any other document, concerning any complaint about Arnold Glasman, SBN 80095.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Annette Morasch
